-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Pure hash functions for bytestrings
--   
--   This package provides pure hash functions for pure and lazy
--   bytestrings, implementing the same interface as the <i>digest</i>
--   package.
--   
--   For efficiency, use the <i>digest</i> package, which provides FFI
--   bindings to efficient code from zlib, instead.
--   
--   Performance compared to <a>Data.Digest</a> on a Mac Mini 2010, 2.4GHz
--   Core 2 Duo, using <a>Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString</a>:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Data.Digest.Pure.Adler32: 380 MB/s</li>
--   <li>Data.Digest.Adler32: 4906 MB/s</li>
--   <li>Data.Digest.Pure.CRC32: 232 MB/s</li>
--   <li>Data.Digest.CRC32: 774 MB/s</li>
--   </ul>
@package digest-pure
@version 0.0.3


-- | This module provides functions to calculate CRC32 checksums.
module Data.Digest.Pure.CRC32

-- | The class of values for which CRC-32 checksums can be computed.
class CRC32 a
crc32 :: CRC32 a => a -> Word32
crc32Update :: CRC32 a => Word32 -> a -> Word32
instance CRC32 ByteString
instance CRC32 ByteString


-- | This module provides functions to calculate Adler32 checksums.
module Data.Digest.Pure.Adler32

-- | The class of values for which Adler32 checksums can be computed.
class Adler32 a
adler32 :: Adler32 a => a -> Word32
adler32Update :: Adler32 a => Word32 -> a -> Word32
instance Adler32 ByteString
instance Adler32 ByteString
